# Flywheel

> GitHub template for bootstrapping projects with CI, docs, and LLM-driven helpers. Works with ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, or open-source models like Llama 2.

Flywheel bundles style guides, automation scripts, and integration docs so autonomous agents can quickly get oriented.

## Docs
- [README.md](README.md) – overview and setup instructions
- [AGENTS.md](AGENTS.md) – guidance for LLM assistants
- [CLAUDE.md](CLAUDE.md) – Claude-specific advice
- [CUSTOM_INSTRUCTIONS.md](CUSTOM_INSTRUCTIONS.md) – behavior rules
- [docs/best_practices_catalog.md](docs/best_practices_catalog.md) – coding tips

## Examples
- [examples/basic.py](examples/basic.py) – CLI usage example
- [tests/](tests) – baseline tests to extend

## Optional
- [viewer/index.html](viewer/index.html) – interactive 3‑D viewer
- [docs-site/](docs-site) – generated docs site
